title: LOW-VOLTAGE D.C. SUPPLIES
fullText:
Reticulated separated low-voltage d.c. circuits supplying socket-outlets or permanently wired equipment, including d.c. emergency supplies, shall not be earth referenced to the extent that it will deliver less than 10 mA between either supply conductor and earth.
Exception:
1	Low-voltage d.c. circuits that are reticulated between separate parts of a single equipment system.
